name: Hotelopoly
description:
With all of the dynamic trades, windfalls, setbacks and wildcards, America's hotel market can often resemble a property trading board game. Hotelopoly U.S.A. offers a large selection of trusted hotels to buy, trade, rent, and sell as you view from some of America's best 5-star luxury hotel properties and get ideas for that next meeting, conference, or summer holiday! Play Hotelopoly U.S.A. today!

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
